00063 KStartupLogo::KStartupLogo()
00064     : QWidget(0, "startuplogo", WStyle_Customize | WStyle_NoBorder) {
00065 
00066   QPixmap pm;   
00067     if ( !pm.load(locate("BT_pic","startuplogo.png")) )
00068     qWarning("Can't load startuplogo! Check your installation.");
00069 
00070   setBackgroundPixmap(pm);
00071 
00072   //Please not change the margin
00073   textLabel = new QLabel(this);
00074   textLabel->setGeometry(0,pm.height(),pm.width(),textLabel->sizeHint().height());
00075   textLabel->setBackgroundColor( Qt::black );
00076 
00077     QPalette p = palette();
00078   p.setColor( QPalette::Inactive, QColorGroup::Text, Qt::white );
00079   p.setColor( QPalette::Inactive, QColorGroup::Foreground, Qt::white );
00080   p.setColor( QPalette::Normal, QColorGroup::Text, Qt::white );
00081   p.setColor( QPalette::Normal, QColorGroup::Foreground, Qt::white );
00082   setPalette( p );
00083 
00084   setGeometry (
00085     (KApplication::desktop()->width()-pm.width())/2,
00086         (KApplication::desktop()->height()-pm.height()-textLabel->height())/2,
00087     pm.width(),
00088     pm.height()+textLabel->height());
00089 }

00091 void KStartupLogo::setText(const QString text){
00092     //Please not make the text bold & let the first character be blank
00093   textLabel->setText( QString::fromLatin1(" %1").arg(text) );
00094   KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents();
